383990.name: Battle Fantasia -Revised Edition- Original Soundtrack
383990.description:
Battle Fantasia Original Soundtrack

Songs are placed in a separate folder, in your Steam install directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Battle Fantasia Revised Edition\Battle Fantasia Original Soundtrack\

* Format: MP3
* Soundtrack length: 44m 43s
* Total size: 102 MB
* 44100 Hz sample rate
* 320 kpbs bitrate

Tracklist:


1) Main Title
2) Character Select
3) Prateness
4) Aden
5) La Concorde
6) Humperdinck Forest
7) Coyori-Tei
8) Sarai Cave
9) Donvalve & Co.
10) Dool Desert
11) Moschata
12) Last Battle
13) Deathbringer
14) Continue
15) Game over
16) Fanfare
17) End Credits
18) Prologue

Music Producer & Composer

Suemura Kennosuke

Contents Producer

伊藤 泰則 (YELLOW TUNE TRACKS)

Music Director & Rec/Mix Engineer

新堀 崇 (STUDIO PJ)

Recording Studio

STUDIO PJ
383990.supported_languages:
英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语*
